title: Entertainment Live: Strictly finalists revealed; Adele announces US dates - BBC News
summary: anita rani misses out on strictly come dancing final .
mad max : fury road tops critics ' choice nominations .
louisa johnson wins x factor final .

documents.title: that 's all , folks !
text: our time is up for the day , so thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back bright and early tomorrow from 08:30 gmt with news and from the los angeles premiere of star wars : the force awakens .
see you then !
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: carrie fisher and ellen degeneres sell star wars tickets
text: with tickets for star wars : the force awakens the hottest items in town , princess leia herself carrie fisher and chat show host ellen degeneres took to the streets of los angeles to sell some for charity .
wearing matching leia buns , the pair spread some holiday cheer for star wars fans - though one did n't quite recognise fisher in her disguise

documents.title: david walliams and joanne lumley spoof bake off
text: david walliams and joanna lumley will send up great british bake off judges paul hollywood and mary berry as part of a one-off comedy sketch show this christmas .
the pair have promised plenty of `` steamy '' gags inspired by the double entendres that have become as much part of the baking show as the cakes - cue jokes about `` soggy bottoms '' .
walliams and friends goes out on bbc one at 22:05 gmt on 24 december .

documents.title: eurovision song contest - hosts announced
text: here 's a of swedish singer mans zelmerlow and swedish comedian petra mede , who were unveiled earlier as the hosts of next year 's eurovision song contest in stockholm .
zelmerlow , fans of the competition will recall , won this year 's contest in vienna with his upbeat pop anthem heroes .
petra , for her part , hosted the show in 2013 when it was held in the swedish city of malmo .
the tv personality said it was `` a dream come true '' to be invited back , this time with zelmerlow at her side .
here 's how the pair announced their upcoming collaboration on twitter .
meet the hosts of the 2016 # eurovision song contest , @ twitterid and petra mede !

documents.title: mad max tops critics ' choice nominations
text: mad max : fury road continues its petrol-powered push towards the oscars by landing another bunch of awards nominations , this time from the broadcast film critics association .
george miller 's reboot of the post-apocalyptic action series is up for 13 of their critics ' choice awards in all - four more than carol , the martian and the revenant , its nearest rivals .
british talents in contention include eddie redmayne , a best actor candidate for his work in the danish girl , and charlotte rampling , up for best actress thanks to her role in 45 years .
spectre 's daniel craig and mad max star tom hardy are also up for honours in the best actor in an action movie category , with sicario 's emily blunt the only brit in the female equivalent .
fargo is the tv show with the most nominations , having up eight citations ahead of the bfca 's los angeles award ceremony on 17 january .
that 's the same day , incidentally , that the london film critics ' circle will be handing out their awards .
tune in tomorrow when we 'll be bringing you that organisation 's list of nominations .

documents.title: our man backstage
text: our entertainment correspondent lizo mzimba is in los angeles at the moment to cover the star wars : the force awakens premiere .
but he still found time over the weekend to post this snap of himself hanging out backstage with dan smith from bastille .
great seeing @ twitterid play la this weekend .

gorged on bananas and sprite !

documents.title: taylor swift gives birthday present to fans
text: yesterday was taylor swift 's 26th birthday and , as a gift to fans , she announced she will be releasing a concert video from her star-studded 1989 world tour .
fans will be able to stream the video on apple music .

it 's clear swift and apple have kissed and made up now after the singer pulled her songs briefly from the streaming platform in june , in protest over apple not paying artists during the free trial period for subscribers .
the singer posted a teaser for the concert on twitter .

documents.title: chelsea handler takes a swing at andy roddick
text: former us talk show host chelsea handler teamed up with maria sharapova at the weekend for a charity tennis match in los angeles .
the pair took on tennis pro andy roddick and arrested development star will arnett , winning the match 3-1 .
the game was part of the inaugural maria sharapova and friends event , which aims to bring tennis to the local los angeles community and raise money for the maria sharapova foundation .

documents.title: coleman 's victoria gets her albert
text: it 's been confirmed actor tom hughes , of the game and cemetery junction fame , will play prince albert opposite jenna coleman 's queen victoria in itv 's upcoming eight-part drama about the british monarch .
here 's what hughes has to say about his latest role and the show 's writer , daisy goodwin :
victoria and albert 's story is one that not only had a lasting impact on this country 's history , but also provides a rich depth of material to create an engaging and powerful series .
an historically informative , political , passionate love story .
one that still feels relevant to modern life .
something that daisy has captured perfectly with her scripts .
hughes will make his first appearance in the third episode of victoria , which documents the early life of the monarch after her ascension to the throne at the age of 18 .

documents.title: ex-apprentice duo pen children 's book
text: if you watch the apprentice , you 'll be familiar with snottydink - the character created by contestants sam curry and elle stevenson ( week five of the show during a task to create a children 's book .
the pair lost the task but the book 's limited print run was a success , with some copies selling online for £ 70 .
now curry and stevenson have published a second book , gobble gruff , about an oversized beast who is part ogre , part cat and who lives in a magical forest .
dominic trevett , who drew snottydink 's original illustrations on the bbc one programme , has also created gobble gruff .
curry said the book , which goes on sale this week , conveyed `` an important moral about acceptance '' .
stevenson added :
we worked hard to create something magical that children and parents alike could enjoy this festive season .

documents.title: star wars fever hots up around the world
text: it can hardly have escaped your attention that a new star wars film comes out this week - a seismic event people are preparing for around the world in various ways .
outside the tlc chinese theatre in hollywood , some fans have been using the time they 've spent waiting for the film 's us premiere by brushing up on their lightsaber skills .
in moscow , the side of a building has been decorated with a stormtrooper mural as the city gears up for the film 's russian premiere on thursday .
in the mexican city of monterrey , meanwhile , a wookiee answers the call of nature at a star wars fan club event .
may the faucet be with you

documents.title: adele announces north american dates
text: chart-topping british singer adele has confirmed a string of 2016 tour dates in the us , canada and mexico , starting on 5 july in st paul in minnesota and ending in mexico city on 15 november .
the north american leg , which includes six nights at the staples center in los angeles and another six at madison square garden in new york , follows already announced dates in the uk and europe .
with that leg running from 29 february to 15 june , there 's a gaping hole around the end of june that could be easily plugged by a visit to a certain music festival in somerset .
find out more on adele 's official site .

documents.title: tina fey on women in film and donald trump
text: us comedienne tina fey was on bbc breakfast earlier , talking to louise minchin about her new comedy sisters , the role of women in film and her thoughts on republican presidential candidate donald trump .
check out the interview .

documents.title: jennifer lawrence all smiles at joy premiere
text: jennifer lawrence was on the red carpet again last night at the new york premiere of her latest biographical drama joy .

the hunger games actress plays joy mangano , inventor of the miracle mop , in david o russell 's film , which explores how mangano battled against the odds , and her own family , to assert herself as a businesswoman and entrepreneur .
the real mangano was also at sunday 's event and tweeted this photo of herself with lawrence and bradley cooper , another of the film 's stars .
this is surreal !

documents.title: x factor final attracts 8.2m viewers
text: the overnight ratings are in and the figures show an average of 8.2 million people tuned in to watch the x factor final results show , peaking at 9.7 million when louisa johnson was announced as the winner .

there were also a couple of other ratings spikes during the show , with 9.1 million watching one direction 's last performance before they take an extended break , and 9.2 million seeing adele sing her number one smash hit hello .
the figures should make itv and simon cowell happy after saturday 's final show received its lowest ratings ever , with an average of just 5.7 million people tuning in .
meanwhile , the strictly come dancing semi-final results programme on bbc one was watched by an average of 10.8 million on sunday , peaking at 11.7 million .

documents.title: whaling film harpooned at us box office
text: hollywood studio executives will be blubbering today with the news that ron howard 's moby dick-inspired drama in the heart of the sea has floundered at the us and canada box office .

the whaling-themed e which stars chris hemsworth and is thought to have cost around $ 100m ( £ 66m ) to make , took just $ 11m ( £ 7.25m ) over the weekend , despite opening in more than 3,000 north american cinemas .
`` some movies work and unfortunately some movies do n't , '' said warner bros ' jeff goldstein , insisting the studio `` stand [ s ] behind ron and his vision for the story '' .
a sign of how little howard 's film resonated with audiences was the fact the latest hunger games film made more in its fourth weekend in cinemas than in the heart of the sea did in its first .
there she blows indeed .
read more on this story .

documents.title: olivia williams on booker judging panel
text: actress olivia williams has been named as one of the five judges who 'll decide the recipient of the 2016 man booker prize for fiction .

the sixth sense and case sensitive star , on the left above , will join [ l to r ] poet david harsent , historian and broadcaster amanda foreman , novelist abdulrazak gurnah and critic jon day on the panel of five .
foreman , chair of the panel , said she and her colleagues had `` an incredibly intense and stimulating time ahead '' .

the presenter of bbc two 's the ascent of woman said being on the panel was `` a once-in-a-lifetime experience '' , before adding : `` if anybody needs to speak to me , i 'll be in my study , reading . ''
this year 's prize went to jamaican author marlon james for his bob marley-themed novel a brief history of seven killings .

documents.title: dick van dyke celebrates 90th at disneyland
text: here 's a of dick van dyke celebrating his 90th birthday on sunday with wife arlene silver van dyke at disneyland in anaheim , california .
the disney theme park put on a mary poppins-themed celebration for the veteran , which included a chimney sweep guard of honour in tribute to his beloved character bert .
even mary herself was on hand to give the chitty chitty bang bang and diagnosis murder star a day he 'll never forget .

documents.title: another strictly contestant bites the dust
text: last night 's strictly come dancing saw anita rani leave the show , just missing out on a place in next week 's final .
the one show host found herself in the bottom two with katie derham , but in a surprise move the judges chose to save the radio 3 and bbc proms host .
rani tweeted afterwards :
the strictly team also tweeted a video of the finalists paying tribute to rani following her departure .
derham 's partner , anton du beke , was clearly chuffed with the result .
it 's the first time he 's made the final in all 13 series he 's participated in , as he 's usually voted off in the early weeks .
but some fans were't happy with the result .

documents.title: shia labeouf gets 'touching ' tattoo
text: us actor shia labeouf was in a liverpool art gallery all weekend answering phone calls , having asked people to call in and tell him something that would `` touch his soul '' .
it was the transformers and indiana jones star 's latest foray into performance art , in the name of exploring relationships in the modern world and breaking down the mythology of celebrity .
the `` performance '' came to an end on sunday with shia getting a tattoo on his left forearm of `` you .
now .
wow '' - the phrase `` touched his soul '' most deeply .
shia and his two collaborators made notes of every call and put them on their website .
here 's a transcript of the call that provided the winning phrase .
i 'm touching your soul from egypt .
this .
the connection .
this is feeling .
i feel .
i feel it .
i do n't need to be there with you now .
i feel it .
i 'm smiling .
you .
now .
wow .
i feel it .
# touchmysoul
you .
now .
wow .
# touchmysoul
@ twitterid cool tattoo !
what the absolute fuck
@ twitterid you won wow ?
@ twitterid tres parte de una sola pieza

documents.title: independence day sequel releases trailer
text: `` that is definitely bigger than the last one ! ''
says jeff goldblum of a flying saucer , glimpsed in the trailer for the sequel to 1996 blockbuster independence day .
the makers of independence day : resurgence have clearly taken his words to heart , judging by the reams of fx-laden mayhem on show in this all-action promo .
there 's no sign of will smith this time around - though his character 's son , played by jessie usher , will be on hand to continue the family 's alien-battling legacy .
check out the trailer .

documents.title: rafe spall on ghost hunter role
text: the name 's price - harry price .
that 's who rafe spall - son of timothy , in case you were wondering - will be seen as this christmas in a one-off supernatural drama for itv .
harry price : ghost hunter sees spall play a conman medium who is asked to probe a haunting in a local politician 's home .

ahead of its broadcast on 27 december , the actor took time out of his busy schedule to discuss the character , his thoughts on the supernatural and his unexpected connection to the real-life person he 's playing .
read the feature .

documents.title: catch up from the weekend
text: in case you were out and about over the weekend , here are some of the headlines you may have missed .

documents.title: louisa johnson wins x factor
text: first up , x factor crowned its latest victor last night with 17-year-old louisa johnson winning the title - the youngest person ever to win the singing contest .
mentored by rita ora , the teen said she had `` imagined this day for so many years '' .
itv said johnson won 53.9 % of the final vote , with her competition reggie 'n ' bollie receiving 38.9 % and che chesterman getting 7.2 % before he was voted off on saturday night .
itv has also published the full voting break down from each week , showing johnson topped the vote on five of the seven live shows .
johnson tweeted after she won :
read more on this story .

documents.title: get in touch with us
text: so what did you get up to the weekend ?
did you watch the x factor final ?
and what do you make of this year 's strictly final line-up ?
get in touch with us by tweeting @ bbcnewsents or emailing entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .
author: Neil Smith
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: happy mondays
text: good morning and welcome to another week of entertainment live news updates .
stick around with us as we bring you up to date with what happened over the weekend and the latest headlines of today .
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter
